scripts.fresh: bunx rimraf node_modules/ bun.lock && bun i
scripts.check: bun run check:eslint & bun run check:stylelint && bun run check:types  && bun run check:unused
scripts.lint: bun run check:eslint && bun run check:stylelint
scripts.db:view: concurrently "bun drizzle-kit studio --config src/drizzle.config.ts" "pnpm dlx drizzle-lab visualizer" "sleep 1 && pnpm dlx drizzle-view"
scripts.generate: bunx prisma generate && cd backend && bunx drizzle-kit generate && bunx drizzle-kit push
